email.subject: Hacker Wars: Entry Rejected
email.body:
Dear #PLAYERNAME#,
Thank you for sending in your request to compete for the Hacker Wars competition this year.
As you'll no doubt be surprised, a lot requests were received this year, following the success of last years competition.
Unfortunately due to the volume of requests, yours has not been accepted.
We hope you will re-submit again next year!
Sincerely, Judith Thomas | Hacker Wars Centre Coordinator
